mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT('${filePathPrefix}',icon) `icon`,su.* FROM sys_user su WHERE su.username = #{username} limit 1

SELECT su.id,su.username,su.real_name as realName,su.allow_login AS allowLogin,su.phone AS phone, su.last_active_time AS lastActiveTime,su.create_time AS createTime,IFNULL(sr.name,'暂无权限') AS roleName, su.last_ip_address AS laseIpAddress,CONCAT('${filePathPrefix}',su.icon) `icon` FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.id = su.role_id WHERE su.id > 1
AND position(#{userName} IN su.username)
AND su.role_id = #{roleId}
AND su.allow_login = #{allowLogin}
AND su.last_active_time LIKE concat(#{lastActiveTime},'%')
AND su.create_time LIKE concat(#{createTime},'%')
ORDER BY su.create_time ASC
